title: 2013 Ukrainian Cup Final
text:
The 2013 Ukrainian Cup Final is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> match that was played at the <a href="Metalist%20Stadium">Metalist Stadium</a>, <a href="Kharkiv">Kharkiv</a>, on 22 May 2013. The match was the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Ukrainian%20Cup">22nd Ukrainian Cup Final</a> and was contested by the champions of Ukraine <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">Shakhtar Donetsk</a> and <a href="FC%20Chornomorets%20Odesa">Chornomorets Odesa</a>. This was the third time that the final match had returned to Kharkiv.
Since Shakhtar had qualified for the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20UEFA%20Champions%20League">2013–14 UEFA Champions League</a>, Chornomorets would then qualify for the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20UEFA%20Europa%20League">2013–14 UEFA Europa League</a>. During the draw for the semi-finals, the matchup Shakhtar Donetsk–<a href="PFC%20Sevastopol">Sevastopol</a> was identified as the home team for the final.
Road to Kharkiv.
As Ukrainian Premier League members "Shakhtar Donetsk" and "Chornomorets Odesa" did not have to go through the qualification phase of the competition.
Previous encounters.
This was the first Ukrainian Cup final between the two teams. The two teams also met in the semi-finals in <a href="2007%E2%80%9308%20Ukrainian%20Cup%23Semifinals%20%281/2%29">2007–08</a>, <a href="2003%E2%80%9304%20Ukrainian%20Cup%23Semifinals">2003–04</a> and <a href="1994%E2%80%9395%20Ukrainian%20Cup%23Semifinals">1994–95</a>. On all three occasions, Shakhtar was victorious.
Chornomorets had appeared only twice in a Cup final winning on both occasions and their opponents Shakhtar had appeared in 12 Cup finals, winning eight of them.
Television.
As last year, the match was broadcast on <a href="ICTV%20%28Ukraine%29">ICTV</a> in Ukraine.
